description: elongated vertically positioned female torso and legs to upper calf; no head, arms or feet; contrapposto pose with PR knee in front of PL; PL shoulder down; vertical tapering support on back between legs; cylindrical shaped base; green patina
marks:
Signature, Date and Inscription

see Signed on top of base, incised: [Archipenko / 4 / 1916]
title: Female torso and legs
